```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
library("janitor")
library("patchwork")
library("here")
library("kableExtra")
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#mean body mass in grams
#making it pretty ----
#ITS A TABLE ----
penguins |>
  group_by(species, island) |>
  summarise(mean_mass = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  kable(col.names = c("Species", "Island", "Body Mass (grams)")) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = FALSE)
```
